photo.title: barcelona modernisme: palau guell

photo.description: Standing in literally the next street from my hotel one of the early works of Antoni Gaudi has its place. The Palau Guell was a building he designed for his benefactor Eusebi Guell and you can already see some style elements that Gaudi would use later on in his other works. Unfortunately the road the building stands in is so narrow that you can't photograph a good front view. Aside from that the building was closed so that I couldn't take pictures from the inside. What you see here though are the sculptures/chimneys on top in typical Gaudi style. Taken during a trip to Barcelona in May 2009. Please visit the whole set.

photo.tags: larambla palauguell agaudí 1889 barcelona catalunha antonigaudí cidadevelha larambra eusebigüell guell´spalace palácioguëll
photo.title: Palau Guell.

photo.description: O Palau Güell (em português Palácio Guëll) é um palácio localizado na cidade de Barcelona, Espanha. Construído entre 1885 e 1889, foi desenhado por Antoni Gaudí para Eusebi Güell, seu principal cliente. Não haveria limite de orçamento. :) Nou de la Rambla 3-5.
photo.tags: antonigaudí palauguell cidadevelha larambra eusebigüell guell´spalace palácioguëll barcelona
photo.title: Palau Guell.
